mil5.1.1:1.1_0: Atha kho milindo rājā katāvakāso nipacca garuno pāde sirasi añjaliṁ katvā etadavoca—
mil5.1.1:1.3_1: na parinibbuto buddho saṁyutto lokena antobhaviko lokasmiṁ lokasādhāraṇo,
mil5.1.1:1.3_2: tasmā tassa kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphalo.
mil5.1.1:1.4_0: Yadi parinibbuto visaṁyutto lokena nissaṭo sabbabhavehi,
mil5.1.1:1.4_3: asādiyantassa kato adhikāro vañjho bhavati aphalo’ti ubhato koṭiko eso pañho,
mil5.1.1:4.2_5: iṅgha me tvaṁ tattha kāraṇaṁ sammā brūhi sakavādassa patiṭṭhāpanāya diṭṭhijālaviniveṭhanāyā”ti.
mil5.1.1:5.2_2: asādiyantasseva tathāgatassa devamanussā dhāturatanaṁ vatthuṁ karitvā tathāgatassa ñāṇaratanārammaṇena
mil5.1.1:6.2_2: kiṁ pana nibbuto upasanto acetano sādiya”ti?
mil5.1.1:6.3_0: “Tasmiṁ pana, mahārāja, aggikkhandhe uparate upasante loke aggi suñño hotī”ti.
mil5.1.1:6.4_3: te attano thāmabalavīriyena paccattapurisakārena kaṭṭhaṁ manthayitvā aggiṁ nibbattetvā tena agginā aggikaraṇīyāni kammāni karontī”ti.
mil5.1.1:6.5_1: titthiyānaṁ vacanaṁ micchā bhavati ‘asādiyantassa kato adhikāro vañjho bhavati aphalo’ti.
mil5.1.1:7.2_0: evameva bhagavā dasasahassiyā lokadhātuyā buddhasiriyā pajjali.
mil5.1.1:7.4_0: evameva bhagavā dasasahassiyā lokadhātuyā buddhasiriyā pajjalitvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuto.
mil5.1.1:7.5_0: Yathā, mahārāja, nibbuto aggikkhandho tiṇakaṭṭhupādānaṁ na sādiyati;
mil5.1.1:7.6_0: evameva kho lokahitassa sādiyanā pahīnā upasantā.
mil5.1.1:7.7_1: manussā nibbute aggikkhandhe anupādāne attano thāmabalavīriyena paccattapurisakārena kaṭṭhaṁ manthayitvā
mil5.1.1:7.7_2: aggiṁ nibbattetvā tena agginā aggikaraṇīyāni kammāni karonti;
mil5.1.1:7.8_0: evameva kho devamanussā tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva dhāturatanaṁ vatthuṁ karitvā tathāgatassa
mil5.1.1:7.8_1: ñāṇaratanārammaṇena sammāpaṭipattiṁ sevantā tisso sampattiyo paṭilabhanti, imināpi, mahārāja,
mil5.1.1:7.8_2: kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphalo.
mil5.1.1:8.1_1: uttariṁ kāraṇaṁ suṇohi yena kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphalo.
mil5.1.1:8.3_0: “Na hi, bhante, uparatassa vātassa ābhogo vā manasikāro vā puna nibbattāpanāya”.
mil5.1.1:8.6_0: “Api nu tassa, mahārāja, uparatassa vātassa vātoti samaññā apagacchatī”ti?
mil5.1.1:8.7_3: te tālavaṇṭena vā vidhūpanena vā attano thāmabalavīriyena paccattapurisakārena taṁ nibbattetvā tena vātena uṇhaṁ nibbāpenti pariḷāhaṁ vūpasamentī”ti.
mil5.1.1:8.8_1: titthiyānaṁ vacanaṁ micchā bhavati ‘asādiyantassa kato adhikāro vañjho bhavati aphalo’ti.
mil5.1.1:9.2_0: evameva bhagavā dasasahassiyā lokadhātuyā sītalamadhurasantasukhumamettāvātena upavāyi.
mil5.1.1:9.4_0: evameva bhagavā sītalamadhurasantasukhumamettāvātena upavāyitvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuto.
mil5.1.1:9.5_0: Yathā, mahārāja, uparato vāto puna nibbattāpanaṁ na sādiyati;
mil5.1.1:9.7_0: Yathā, mahārāja, te manussā uṇhābhitattā pariḷāhaparipīḷitā;
mil5.1.1:9.9_0: Yathā tālavaṇṭavidhūpanāni vātassa nibbattiyā paccayā honti;
mil5.1.1:9.10_0: evameva tathāgatassa dhātu ca ñāṇaratanañca paccayo hoti tissannaṁ sampattīnaṁ paṭilābhāya.
mil5.1.1:9.11_0: Yathā manussā uṇhābhitattā pariḷāhaparipīḷitā tālavaṇṭena vā vidhūpanena vā vātaṁ nibbattetvā uṇhaṁ nibbāpenti pariḷāhaṁ vūpasamenti;
mil5.1.1:9.12_0: evameva devamanussā tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva dhātuñca ñāṇaratanañca pūjetvā kusalaṁ
mil5.1.1:9.12_1: nibbattetvā tena kusalena tividhaggisantāpapariḷāhaṁ nibbāpenti vūpasamenti.
mil5.1.1:9.13_1: kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphaloti.
mil5.1.1:10.1_0: Aparampi, mahārāja, uttariṁ kāraṇaṁ suṇohi paravādānaṁ niggahāya.
mil5.1.1:10.3_2: natthi tassa puna uppādāya ābhogo vā manasikāro vā,
mil5.1.1:10.3_3: sakiṁ nibbatte bherisadde antarahite so bherisaddo samucchinno hoti.
mil5.1.1:10.4_2: atha puriso paccaye sati attajena vāyāmena bheriṁ akoṭetvā saddaṁ nibbattetī”ti.
mil5.1.1:11.1_2: satthāraṁ ṭhapayitvā sayaṁ anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuto,
mil5.1.1:11.1_3: na ca parinibbute bhagavati sampattilābho upacchinno hoti,
mil5.1.1:11.1_4: bhavadukkhapaṭipīḷitā sattā dhāturatanañca dhammañca vinayañca anusiṭṭhañca paccayaṁ karitvā sampattikāmā sampattiyo paṭilabhanti, imināpi, mahārāja,
mil5.1.1:11.1_5: kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphaloti.
mil5.1.1:12.2_1: tumhākaṁ evamassa atītasatthukaṁ pāvacanaṁ natthi no satthāti,
mil5.1.1:12.2_4: mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto,
mil5.1.1:12.3_0: Parinibbutassa tathāgatassa asādiyantassa kato adhikāro vañjho bhavati aphaloti,
mil5.1.1:12.3_1: taṁ tesaṁ titthiyānaṁ vacanaṁ micchā abhūtaṁ vitathaṁ alikaṁ viruddhaṁ viparītaṁ dukkhadāyakaṁ dukkhavipākaṁ apāyagamanīyanti.
mil5.1.1:13.1_1: uttariṁ kāraṇaṁ suṇohi yena kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphalo.
mil5.1.1:13.2_0: Sādiyati nu kho, mahārāja, ayaṁ mahāpathavī ‘sabbabījāni mayi saṁviruhantū’”ti?
mil5.1.1:13.4_1: bījāni asādiyantiyā mahāpathaviyā saṁviruhitvā daḷhamūlajaṭāpatiṭṭhitā khandhasārasākhāparivitthiṇṇā pupphaphaladharā hontī”ti?
mil5.1.1:13.5_1: mahāpathavī tesaṁ bījānaṁ vatthu hoti paccayaṁ deti viruhanāya,
mil5.1.1:13.5_2: tāni bījāni taṁ vatthuṁ nissāya tena paccayena saṁviruhitvā daḷhamūlajaṭāpatiṭṭhitā khandhasārasākhāparivitthiṇṇā pupphaphaladharā hontī”ti.
mil5.1.1:13.6_0: “Tena hi, mahārāja, titthiyā sake vāde naṭṭhā honti hatā viruddhā, sace te bhaṇanti—
mil5.1.1:14.1_0: Yathā, mahārāja, mahāpathavī, evaṁ tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho.
mil5.1.1:14.2_0: Yathā, mahārāja, mahāpathavī na kiñci sādiyati, evaṁ tathāgato na kiñci sādiyati.
mil5.1.1:14.3_1: tāni bījāni pathaviṁ nissāya saṁviruhitvā daḷhamūlajaṭāpatiṭṭhitā khandhasārasākhāparivitthiṇṇā pupphaphaladharā honti,
mil5.1.1:14.3_2: evaṁ devamanussā tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva dhātuñca ñāṇaratanañca nissāya daḷhakusalamūlapatiṭṭhitā
mil5.1.1:14.3_4: kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphaloti.
mil5.1.1:15.1_1: uttariṁ kāraṇaṁ suṇohi yena kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphalo.
mil5.1.1:15.2_1: ime oṭṭhā goṇā gadrabhā ajā pasū manussā antokucchismiṁ kimikulānaṁ sambhavan”ti?
mil5.1.1:15.4_1: kimayo tesaṁ asādiyantānaṁ antokucchismiṁ sambhavitvā bahuputtanattā vepullataṁ pāpuṇantī”ti?
mil5.1.1:15.5_1: kammassa balavatāya asādiyantānaṁyeva tesaṁ sattānaṁ antokucchismiṁ kimayo sambhavitvā bahuputtanattā vepullataṁ pāpuṇantī”ti.
mil5.1.1:15.6_1: tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva dhātussa ca ñāṇārammaṇassa ca balavatāya tathāgate kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphaloti.
mil5.1.1:16.1_1: uttariṁ kāraṇaṁ suṇohi yena kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphalo.
mil5.1.1:16.2_0: Sādiyanti nu kho, mahārāja, ime manussā ime aṭṭhanavuti rogā kāye nibbattantū”ti?
mil5.1.1:16.4_0: “Kissa pana te, mahārāja, rogā asādiyantānaṁ kāye nipatantī”ti?
mil5.1.1:16.6_1: pubbe kataṁ akusalaṁ idha vedanīyaṁ hoti, tena hi, mahārāja,
mil5.1.1:16.6_2: pubbe katampi idha katampi kusalākusalaṁ kammaṁ avañjhaṁ bhavati saphalanti.
mil5.1.1:16.7_1: kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphaloti.
mil5.1.1:17.1_1: nandako nāma yakkho theraṁ sāriputtaṁ āsādayitvā pathaviṁ paviṭṭho”ti?
mil5.1.1:17.3_0: “Api nu kho, mahārāja, thero sāriputto sādiyi nandakassa yakkhassa mahāpathavigilanan”ti.
mil5.1.1:17.4_1: sadevake loke patamānepi chamāyaṁ candimasūriye vikirantepi sinerupabbatarāje thero sāriputto na parassa dukkhaṁ sādiyeyya.
mil5.1.1:17.6_0: Yena hetunā thero sāriputto kujjheyya vā dusseyya vā,
mil5.1.1:17.6_1: so hetu therassa sāriputtassa samūhato samucchinno,
mil5.1.1:17.6_3: thero sāriputto jīvitahārakepi kopaṁ na kareyyā”ti.
mil5.1.1:17.7_1: thero sāriputto nandakassa yakkhassa pathavigilanaṁ na sādiyi,
mil5.1.1:17.7_2: kissa pana nandako yakkho pathaviṁ paviṭṭho”ti?
mil5.1.1:17.9_1: akusalassa kammassa balavatāya nandako yakkho pathaviṁ paviṭṭho,
mil5.1.1:17.9_2: asādiyantassāpi kato aparādho avañjho bhavati saphalo.
mil5.1.1:17.10_1: akusalassapi kammassa balavatāya asādiyantassa kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphaloti.
mil5.1.1:17.11_1: kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphaloti.
mil5.1.1:18.1_0: Kati nu kho te, mahārāja, manussā, ye etarahi mahāpathaviṁ paviṭṭhā, atthi te tattha savaṇan”ti?
mil5.1.1:18.5_0: Sutametaṁ, bhante, ime pañca janā mahāpathaviṁ paviṭṭhā”ti.
mil5.1.1:18.8_0: “Api nu kho, mahārāja, bhagavā vā sāvakā vā sādiyiṁsu imesaṁ mahāpathavipavisanan”ti?
mil5.1.1:18.10_1: tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphalo”ti.
